definition: the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
details:
noun
- the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
= example: the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
= synonyms: mound
- an open vessel with a handle and a spout for pouring
= synonyms: ewer
- (baseball) the person who does the pitching
= example: (baseball) the person who does the pitching
= synonyms: twirler
- (botany) a leaf that that is modified in such a way as to resemble a pitcher or ewer
- the quantity contained in a pitcher
= synonyms: pitcherful
